content.raw:
A few comments:

* Should these be capitalized? `FetchAsset`?
* The word `resource` has been used throughout fuel, instead of asset, so `FetchResource`?
* This function is only downloading models, not worlds. Should it handle all resource types?
* What's the difference between this new API and the one on [ign.hh](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel-tools/src/63e184b7ba3700b86883670b1c8c6ddae7398b50/include/ignition/fuel_tools/ign.hh?fileviewer=file-view-default)? This function seems to be doing the same as [downloadUrl](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel-tools/src/63e184b7ba3700b86883670b1c8c6ddae7398b50/src/ign_src_TEST.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#ign_src_TEST.cc-202).
content.html:
A few comments:

  • Should these be capitalized? FetchAsset?
  • The word resource has been used throughout fuel, instead of asset, so FetchResource?
  • This function is only downloading models, not worlds. Should it handle all resource types?
  • What's the difference between this new API and the one on ign.hh? This function seems to be doing the same as downloadUrl.
